original_text: The priest will put his finger in the blood of the dead animal. He will put some of it on the horns of the altar. He will pour the blood that he did not use onto the ground. He will pour it in front of the altar.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 속죄 제물의 피를 손가락에 찍어 번제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피는 번제단 밑에 쏟고

sentences.original_text: The priest will put his finger
in the blood of the dead animal
He will put some of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 중 일부를 바를 것이다

sentences.original_text: on the horns of the altar
He will pour it in front of the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 제단 앞에 쏟을 것이다
